Uses of Class
java.lang.ref.ReferenceQueue

Packages that use ReferenceQueue
java.lang Provides core classes of the Android environment. 
java.lang.ref Provides the system's ReferenceQueue implementation as well as different forms of reference objects which impose special behavior on the garbage collector. 
org.apache.http.impl.conn.tsccm The implementation of a thread-safe client connection manager.
